---
title: 'Style overview'
order: 2

subCategory: 'foundation'
customPath: '/design/foundation/icons'
---

<div class="if text layout columns">
  <div class="if text body">
    <strong class="if">Outlined design style</strong>
    <p>
      The If icon library uses outlined icons to match the typeface, If Sans. The icons have a stroke value of 1.5 PX.
    </p>
    <strong class="if">Cap and corner</strong>
    <p>All If icons have Sharp caps and corners. </p>
    <strong class="if">Icon grid</strong>
    <p>
      The icons use a 32 PX grid to get a minimal and simple expression With few, carefully chosen details. Icons are
      adjusted individually for a consistent optical volume over the whole icon family.
    </p>
  </div>
